1.title: The Old Woman's Love and the Naughty Prince Who Appears, Clumsy Love Begins
1.plot: Toyama Sakura is a 39-year-old man-woman. She decides to take her life back in her own hands and find love. Will it be her "natural enemy" Tachibana Rintaro or will it be the much younger BMX hotshot Saeki Hiroto?

2.title: The Great Reversal of Love and Life! The Younger Man Is a Prince?
2.plot: Sakura doesn't have confidence to date the much-younger Hiroto who pursues her non-stop while Shima and Kohei learn about each other's real identities and Tachibana and Sakura become closer.

3.title: The Old Man-Woman's Huge Struggle?! The Couple's Night Alone!
3.plot: Sakura tries to change for love, but isn't ambitious enough. She learns about Hiroto's girlfriend Momo and helps Tachibana ask her to be a model when his model comes up sick.

4.title: The Forbidden Kiss
4.plot: Sakura worries she might be pregnant and has a serious heart-to-heart with Tachibana while Miki is beginning to suspect Kohei is having an affair and Choko goes off the deep end.

5.title: The Feelings That Won't Stop Growing...!! The Shocking Truth Involved in The Relationship!!
5.plot: Hiroto realizes he is starting to care for Sakura when her brother appears and Tachibana learns a secret about Choko and Hiroto.

6.title: Major Turbulence! The Explosive Love Triangle!
6.plot: Tachibana begs Sakura to act as his girlfriend while Hiroto reveals that he has fallen for Sakura which angers Choko.

7.title: The Kiss That Shouldn't Have Happened
7.plot: Sakura and Hiroto plan an overnight trip for their first time while Miki learns of Kohei's and Shima's relationship and falls apart.

8.title: Farewell... And Thank You
8.plot: Hiroto and Sakura spend the night together at a hotel end only end up drinking and talking as Tachibana's ex Kasumi helps him finally realize his true feelings towards Sakura.

9.title: I Like You
9.plot: Things start winding down as we approach the end of the series. With Tachibana's official rejection of Choko and Hiroto's marriage proposal, our resident crazy stalker decides to ruin Hiroto's and Sakura's happiness.

10.title: I Will Protect You
10.plot: Hiroto tries to patch things up with Sakura only to have Choko play her trump card. Meanwhile, Tachibana confesses and prepares to head off to New York. Will Sakura go with him?

11.title: You are the Prince That I Chose
11.plot: Sakura is not sure just what to do. Should she stay and manage the salon in Japan or should she go with Tachibana to New York? This is the subject of conversation for Miki, Shima, and Ken as well. They talk about Sakura's feelings, how unfair it will be to go with Tachibana if she has lingering feelings for Hiroto.

imdb.plot outline: 39-year old Sakura Toyama is a hairdresser and salon assistant manager, who is concerned by her stagnant life. She has just been passed over for the manager position, which has instead been given to Rintaro Tachibana, an old male friend with whom she constantly bickers, she hasn't dated in ten years and her only social life is her girl outings with her two best friends, Miki and Shima. Even if she can't do much to better her professional situation, Sakura decides to at least do something about her love life. She accepts a party invitation from Chiyoko Ogami, a regular at the salon. At the party, she meets 24-year old BMX-cyclist Hiroto Saeki, who claims to be interested in her. The two start dating, but what Sakura doesn't know is that Hiroto is Chiyoko's stepbrother, and that Chiyoko paid him to date her in order to keep her away from Rintaro, whom Chiyoko is obsessed with. Hiroto soon starts falling for Sakura for real, but what will happen when she finds out the truth about how they met? And how does Rintaro really feel about Sakura? Meanwhile, Shima gets dangerously close to Miki's husband, and Miki feels trapped by her passionless marriage and her intrusive mother-in-law.
